alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Montgomery; Tippecanoe; Warren (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 5:46PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Showers producing strong winds will impact portions of northeastern Fountain, Tippecanoe, northern Warren and northeastern Montgomery Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 545 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers producing strong winds along a line extending from near Williamsport to 14 miles southwest of Lafayette to 10 miles southeast of Crawfordsville. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lafayette and West Lafayette around 605 PM EDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 161 and 183. Interstate 74 between mile markers 30 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
